evidence.claim: Adnare utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing to manage healthcare data processing workflows.
The company implements FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
Integration with Azure Functions allows for event-driven processing of data updates in real-time.
Adnare's infrastructure includes Amazon S3 for secure storage of EHRs in compliance with HIPAA regulations.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 or EDI use cases on their site.
